name: Brothers Conflict: Precious Baby
summary: Brothers Conflict: Precious Baby is a Japanese otome visual novel. It is described as a simulation game about dangerous love between siblings. Precious Baby is a port of the first two games in the Brothers Conflict series, Passion Pink and Brilliant Blue. As such, Precious Baby is the first game in the Brothers Conflict franchise to allow the player to romance every character in the series.
